body_html:
Hi @apaszke, Im sure the directory is writeable for me since Im using a root user on both node. With multicast initialization, I'm getting the error showing above which I believe that it can't allocate memory to GPU but doesn't know why.

When there was handshake between two node, both node start creating resnet50 model and allocate the model to the GPU memory. After 300~400 MiB being fetch to GPUs, it prompt the error message above and I'm sure the batch size i set is not too large for a 12GB GPUs.
body_text:
Hi @apaszke, Im sure the directory is writeable for me since Im using a root user on both node. With multicast initialization, I'm getting the error showing above which I believe that it can't allocate memory to GPU but doesn't know why.
When there was handshake between two node, both node start creating resnet50 model and allocate the model to the GPU memory. After 300~400 MiB being fetch to GPUs, it prompt the error message above and I'm sure the batch size i set is not too large for a 12GB GPUs.
body:
Hi @apaszke, Im sure the directory is writeable for me since Im using a root user on both node. With multicast initialization, I'm getting the error showing above which I believe that it can't allocate memory to GPU but doesn't know why. 

When there was handshake between two node, both node start creating resnet50 model and allocate the model to the GPU memory. After 300~400 MiB being fetch to GPUs, it prompt the error message above and I'm sure the batch size i set is not too large for a 12GB GPUs.
